# totalActivityDuration

**Instance Property**

The total activity during the activity segment.

## Declaration

```swift
var totalActivityDuration: TimeInterval
```

## Discussion

This value represents the total amount of time the device’s screen was on during [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/ActivitySegment/dateInterval].
title: totalActivityDuration
